EmailTemplate.name: Forgot Password V2
EmailTemplate.subject: Your new {!Community_Name} password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Click Here {!Community_Url} to reset your password
Your password has been reset for {!Community_Name}. The above link will reset your password but can only be used once. After resetting your password login by going to www.mycampquality.org.au:
Kind Regards,
{!Organization.Name}
